title: My Dead Husband - Novel Updates
genre: Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Arranged Marriage   Death   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Murders   Mythology   Spirits   Younger Love Interests
author: 潜心梦徒
description: My grandmother arranged a ghost wedding for me; from now on, my life will never be the same. Although my 'husband' is supposed to protect me from danger, the only one who can protect me from him is myself. In order to get stronger, I began to learn spells . . . >
